author: Jakob Ståhl
comment: Really good looking watch faces, but doesn't work properly on my Huawei Watch. Ambient mode is really screwed up showing double clocks in full color, and some details are offset in normal mode as well.  Will update review if these things are fixed.

author: nijil mariam jacob
comment: This is best watch face ever seen.. Great design and lots of custom features Beauty full face watch.. And give great battery life Highly recommended..love d design in classic look. Jus awsme....
title: Super app

comment: Really nice however I only got 4 watch faces. The green, coffee, grey and red. The screen shots show a blue face. Is that not included? No way to customize colors?

author: vicky lear
comment: Really,  really liked the look of this watch face and the live watch face works fine but the ambient one shows the face off centre and another one behind.  Fix that and I will definitely re-purchase
title: Ok but ambient broken

author: Eric Persing
comment: Does not function properly in ambient mode on lg g watch.
title: Would be great
